references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian Splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting, a foundational technique that the current work builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: SC-GS: Sparse-controlled Gaussian splatting for editable dynamic scene reconstruction
references.reason: This is a state-of-the-art method for dynamic scene reconstruction using 3D Gaussian splatting that the current work directly compares against and improves upon.

references.paper_title: DynMF: Neural motion factorization for real-time dynamic view synthesis with 3D Gaussian splatting
references.reason: This paper is another state-of-the-art method that is directly compared to and improved upon in the current work.

references.paper_title: Spacetime Gaussian feature splatting for real-time dynamic view synthesis
references.reason: This work presents a related method that extends 3D Gaussian splatting to dynamic scenes, which the current work improves upon.

references.paper_title: 4D Gaussian splatting for real-time dynamic scene rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces a 4D extension of 3D Gaussian splatting, which is closely related to the current work and is improved upon.
